verbs.description: it [V: beginning] [ARG1: to look a lot like hiring guilderland at crossgates mall] some stores seem to be seeking workers as eagerly as they are shoppers on a recent saturday at old navy an employee greeted customers at a help wanted display at the front of the store over at burlington coat factory a poster urged would - be applicants to apply online while j c penney was touting its flexible schedules advancement opportunities and up to 25 percent off purchases the economy is still growing and unemployment is falling although both trends are slowing from their peak the national retail federation projects that holiday spending will grow 4 3 to 4 8 percent from last year 687 9 billion although that rate is less than the 5 3 percent increase seen in 2017 analyst retail council of new york state toys r us national retail federation vice president crossgates mall old navy jc penney burlington coat factory kmart fedex amazoncom the ups store kevin alexander the bon ton stores j c penney president and ceo sears holdings guilderland macy stefond harris amazon u s postal service gray sears ted potrikus latham ups
